build.comment: Builds and returns the generated BandyerSdk instance

setEnvironment.comment: Method to set the environment for all modules

withUserDetailsProvider.comment: Used to fetch users contact information based on user aliases.

withChatEnabled.comment:
Enables initialization of chat module
Set also a chat notification listener, use this observer to handle how to handle an incoming chat message

withCallEnabled.comment:
Enable initialization of call capabilities
Set also a call notification listener, use this listener to handle how to handle an incoming call

withFileSharingEnabled.comment:
Enable initialization of file sharing capabilities
Set also a file sharing notification listener, use this listener to handle how to handle a notification for upload and or download

withWhiteboardEnabled.comment:
Enables initialization of whiteboard module
Set also a whiteboard notification listener, use this observer to handle how to handle an whiteboard events

withScreenSharingEnabled.comment:
Enable initialization of screen sharing capabilities
Set also a screen sharing notification listener, use this listener to handle how to handle a notification for ongoing screen recording

setHttpStack.comment:
For advanced users only!!
Method to personalize the http stack
be sure to apply the httpStackBuilder provided by the sdk, otherwise a new httpStack instance will be created and used!!

setHttpStackBuilder.comment: Method to personalize the http stack

setGsonBuilder.comment: Method to personalize the gson builder

setGson.comment:
For advanced users only!!
Method to use your implementation of gson.
be sure to apply the gsonBuilder provided by the sdk, otherwise a new gson instance will be created and used!!

setLogger.comment: Method to personalize the base sdk logger

allowSDKInitFromActivity.comment:
Enables initialization of SDK from activity
Be aware that the SDK may misbehave if initialized in an Activity!
We strongly suggest to initialize it in the Application if possible.
